code:
-spec area_of_max_diagonal(Dimensions :: [[integer()]]) -> integer().
area_of_max_diagonal(Dimensions) ->
    MaxDiagonalArea = lists:foldl(
        fun([Length, Width], {MaxDiagonal, MaxArea}) ->
            Diagonal = math:sqrt(Length*Length + Width*Width),
            Area = Length * Width,
            case Diagonal > MaxDiagonal of
                true -> {Diagonal, Area};
                false -> case Diagonal == MaxDiagonal andalso Area > MaxArea of
                             true -> {Diagonal, Area};
                             false -> {MaxDiagonal, MaxArea}
                         end
            end
        end, {0.0, 0}, Dimensions),
    element(2, MaxDiagonalArea).
